tool_description: Filters books by publication date range, supporting various date formats and relative date specifications.

book_ids.description: Array of book IDs to filter

date_range_type.description: Date range type: absolute, relative_years, or decade

years_back.description: Number of years back from current date (for relative_years type)

error_messages: Empty book_ids array: Provide at least one book ID to filter.
Invalid date format: Use YYYY-MM-DD format for start_date and end_date.
Invalid date range: start_date must be earlier than end_date.
Invalid date_range_type: Use one of [absolute, relative_years, decade].
Missing required parameter: years_back is required when date_range_type is 'relative_years'.
Invalid decade format: Use format like '1990s' or '2000s' for decade parameter.
usage: Provide book_ids array and specify date filtering criteria. Use absolute dates with start_date/end_date, relative filtering with years_back, or decade-based filtering. At least one date parameter must be provided.

filtered_book_ids.description: Array of book IDs that match the date criteria

date_range_applied.description: Description of the date range filter that was applied

books_remaining.description: Number of books that passed the date filter

earliest_date.description: Earliest publication date among filtered books

latest_date.description: Latest publication date among filtered books
